results.name: a(n) = min(n, A004488(n)), where A004488(n) is base-3 sum n+n without carries.
comment: After the initial zero, sequence contains only terms of A132141, each appearing exactly twice.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..59048
xref: Central diagonal of A325825 (after the initial zero).
